verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add Jesus\add* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* and \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* through \w Jericho|strong="G2410"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \add there was\add* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w named|strong="G2564"\w* \w Zacchæus|strong="G2195"\w*, \w which|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the chief among the \w publicans|strong="G0754"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* the \w press|strong="G3793"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w little|strong="G3398"\w* of \w stature|strong="G2244"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w ran|strong="G4390"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w*, and climbed \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* a sycomore \w tree|strong="G4809"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G3195"\w* to \w pass|strong="G1330"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \add way\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he made \w haste|strong="G4692"\w*, and came \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G5264"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w joyfully|strong="G5463"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w murmured|strong="G1234"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w gone|strong="G1525"\w* to be \w guest|strong="G2647"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* that is a \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Zacchæus|strong="G2195"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, the \w half|strong="G2255"\w* of \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w goods|strong="G5224"\w* I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I have \w taken|strong="G4811"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* from any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* by false \w accusation|strong="G4811"\w*, I \w restore|strong="G0591"\w* \add him\add* \w fourfold|strong="G5073"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w This day|strong="G4594"\+w* \+w is salvation|strong="G4991"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w to this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w*, \+w forsomuch|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2530"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w a son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w to seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w that which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w was lost|strong="G0622"\+w*.\wj*

And \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, he \w added|strong="G4369"\w* and \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* a \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, and \w because|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* \w appear|strong="G0398"\w*.

He \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \wj  \+w A certain|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w nobleman|strong="G2104"\+w* \+w went|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a far|strong="G3117"\+w* \+w country|strong="G5561"\+w* \+w to receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w for himself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w a kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to return|strong="G5290"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he called|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w servants|strong="G1401"\+w*, \+w and delivered|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w pounds|strong="G3414"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Occupy|strong="G4231"\+w* \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w citizens|strong="G4177"\+w* \+w hated|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w a message|strong="G4242"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3694"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w We will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5126"\+w* \+add man\+add* \+w to reign|strong="G0936"\+w* \+w over|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w us|strong="G2248"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it came to pass|strong="G1096"\+w*, \+w that when|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w he was|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w returned|strong="G1880"\+w*, \+w having received|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w*, \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he commanded|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w these|strong="G5128"\+w* \+w servants|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w to be called|strong="G5455"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w to whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he had given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w the money|strong="G0694"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w he might know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w how much|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w every man|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w had gained by trading|strong="G1281"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Then|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w came|strong="G3854"\+w* \+w the first|strong="G4413"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w pound|strong="G3414"\+w* \+w hath gained|strong="G4333"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w pounds|strong="G3414"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Well|strong="G2095"\+w*, \+w thou good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1401"\+w*: \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou hast been|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w faithful|strong="G4103"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w a very little|strong="G1646"\+w*, \+w have thou|strong="G2468"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w over|strong="G1883"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w cities|strong="G4172"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the second|strong="G1208"\+w* \+w came|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w pound|strong="G3414"\+w* \+w hath gained|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w five|strong="G4002"\+w* \+w pounds|strong="G3414"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to him|strong="G5129"\+w*, \+w Be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w over|strong="G1883"\+w* \+w five|strong="G4002"\+w* \+w cities|strong="G4172"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w another|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w came|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+add here is\+add* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w pound|strong="G3414"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w kept laid up|strong="G0606"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w a napkin|strong="G4676"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I feared|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w thou art|strong="G1488"\+w* \+w an austere|strong="G0840"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*: \+w thou takest up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou layedst|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w down|strong="G5087"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w reapest|strong="G2325"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w thou didst|strong="G4687"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w sow|strong="G4687"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he saith|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Out of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w thine own|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w mouth|strong="G4750"\+w* \+w will I judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*, \+add thou\+add* \+w wicked|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1401"\+w*. \+w Thou knewest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w was|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w an austere|strong="G0840"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w taking up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I laid|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w down|strong="G5087"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w reaping|strong="G2325"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I did|strong="G4687"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w sow|strong="G4687"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gavest|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w money|strong="G0694"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the bank|strong="G5132"\+w*, \+w that at|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w coming|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w I might have required|strong="G4238"\+w* \+w mine own|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4862"\+w* \+w usury|strong="G5110"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto them that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w stood by|strong="G3936"\+w*, \+w Take|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w the pound|strong="G3414"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w to him that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w pounds|strong="G3414"\+w*.\wj*

\wj (\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w he hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ten|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w pounds|strong="G3414"\+w*.)\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w unto every one|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w shall be given|strong="G1325"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w shall be taken away|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w enemies|strong="G2190"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w that I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w should reign|strong="G0936"\+w* \+w over|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w bring|strong="G0071"\+w* \+w hither|strong="G5602"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w slay|strong="G2695"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w before|strong="G1715"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, he \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w*, ascending \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w when|strong="G5613"\w* he was come \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethphage|strong="G0967"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \add the mount\add* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*, he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Go ye|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the village|strong="G2968"\+w* \+w over against|strong="G2713"\+w* \+add you\+add*; \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w at your entering|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w ye shall find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w a colt|strong="G4454"\+w* \+w tied|strong="G1210"\+w*, \+w whereon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w never|strong="G4455"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w sat|strong="G2523"\+w*: \+w loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and bring|strong="G0071"\+w* \+add him hither\+add*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do ye loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+add him\+add*? \+w thus|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w shall ye say|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w of him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* were sent \w went|strong="G0649"\w* their \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, and \w found|strong="G2147"\w* even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w loosing|strong="G3089"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w*, the \w owners|strong="G2962"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* loose \w ye|strong="G3089"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w*, they \w spread|strong="G5291"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was come \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w*, even \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w descent|strong="G2600"\w* of the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*, the \w whole|strong="G0537"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* and \w praise|strong="G0134"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the mighty \w works|strong="G1411"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* they had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*;

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add be\add* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w highest|strong="G5310"\w*.
